content:
What should admins be able to see about private streams they are not on?

  • Stream owners (once we have them): I think this is a clear yes
  • Subscriber count: I'm leaning towards yes, here?
  • Number of messages/wk: I'm leaning towards yes here as well?

I could go either way for the last two though. Thoughts?
@Yashashvi Dave fyi
I think all of those seem reasonable.
For this, we have to provide no_of_subs in Stream model, is there any other way? Cause if admin is not subscribed, we can't access other subscribers. @Steve Howell

Would it be possible to compute this on the fly, only for admins? I think there's been pushback in the past on including a subscriber count in the model, mostly due to race conditions making it hard to keep accurate.

Yeah, it is hard to keep subscriber_count in Stream accurate, the way subscribers get updated. But I don't understand :thinking_face:

compute this on the fly, only for admins
oh I see. It's not worth it for this round of changes, then.
